issue.title: add tags to tweets

repository.name: rultor
repository.description: DevOps team assistant that helps you merge, deploy, and release GitHub-hosted apps and libraries

issue.body: Let's add language tags to tweets, getting them from here: https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/#list-languages

body: I'm aware of the task, give me some time to find a developer...
thank you for the ticket reported, I topped your account for 15 mins, transaction `46180120`
@hariso this task is for you, keep [these principles](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions

@hariso The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed. Read about our [Definition of Done](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/15/definition-of-done.html)

@hariso this task is taking too long, I have to change the performer, sorry. Please stop working with it right now. See our [no obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle
@longtimeago the issue is yours, please help

@krzyk Please, close the issue, as PR #941 was accepted and merged.
Thank you!
